title: "Circuitry Wallpapers"
content: Welcome to our website, where you can find a collection of high-quality wallpapers featuring intricate circuitry patterns in neon colors. Our wallpapers are perfect for tech enthusiasts and anyone who loves a futuristic aesthetic. With a black background that makes the neon colors pop, these wallpapers will add a unique touch to your desktop or mobile device. Browse through our selection and download your favorite wallpaper today. Stay up-to-date with our latest additions by following us on social media.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of neon-colored circuitry, set against a black background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
